mapper.select: SELECT C.NO , C.MEMBER_NO , C.TITLE , C.BODY , (CASE WHEN C.WRITE_DATE > SYSDATE - 1 THEN SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), 12, 5) WHEN C.WRITE_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1) THEN SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), 6, 5) ELSE SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 10) END) WRITE_DATE , C.VIEW_COUNT , C.RECOMMEND_COUNT , C.REQUEST_IP , C.DISPLAY_FILE_NAME , M.NO M_NO , M.ID , M.NICKNAME , M.PROFILE_FILE_NAME FROM COMMUNITY C , MEMBER M WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO(+) ORDER BY C.NO DESC

SELECT C.NO , C.MEMBER_NO , C.TITLE , C.BODY , (CASE WHEN C.WRITE_DATE > SYSDATE - 1 THEN SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), 12, 5) WHEN C.WRITE_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1) THEN SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), 6, 5) ELSE TO_CHAR(C.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') END) WRITE_DATE , C.VIEW_COUNT , C.RECOMMEND_COUNT , C.REQUEST_IP , C.DISPLAY_FILE_NAME , M.NO M_NO , M.ID , M.NICKNAME , M.PROFILE_FILE_NAME FROM COMMUNITY C , MEMBER M WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = M.NO(+) AND C.NO = #{no}
